Description: OCEAN-LINE-KOBEItem DescriptionHello, I will support your music life from Japan.I will do my utmost for the service you satisfy. This is a model that reproduced the 1956 specification before humbucker pickup was installed in Les Paul standard.This model equipped with the P - 90 single - coil pickup features a brighter crisp sound than the Les Paul with a general humbucker pickup. Neck shape is finished to a very round neck according to the specification at the time.The tune-omatic bridge that can adjust the octave of each string and the stop · tailpiece will steadily transmit the string vibration to the body with stable tuning and pitch, bringing a comfortable sustain.It is recommended for those looking for a different Les Paul! Slight scratches are seen and the overall feeling of use is less.With 2ND stamp on the back of the head. There is no problem with the neck condition, the truss rod can be rotated about 120 degrees and adjustable. The frets are not chord marks and it is about 8-9 percent remaining. Current String height is about 2.0 mm on the 12 F 6 string side, about 1.5 mm on the 1st string side. (10 -46 gauge) 【Neck Condition】 No problem at present[Truss rod] It is adjustable and it can turn about 120 degrees.【Fret remaining】 8-90%【Producer】 Made in China[Case] ​​genuine gig case【accessories】 ShippingWorldwide shipment by EMS. Title: Epiphone 1956 Les Paul Standard Pro Ebony From Japan.
ConditionDescription: This is a model that reproduced the 1956 specification before humbucker pickup was installed in Les Paul standard.This model equipped with the P - 90 single - coil pickup features a brighter crisp sound than the Les Paul with a general humbucker pickup. Neck shape is finished to a very round neck according to the specification at the time.The tune-omatic bridge that can adjust the octave of each string and the stop · tailpiece will steadily transmit the string vibration to the body with stable tuning and pitch, bringing a comfortable sustain.It is recommended for those looking for a different Les Paul!Slight scratches are seen and the overall feeling of use is less.With 2ND stamp on the back of the head.There is no problem with the neck condition, the truss rod can be rotated about 120 degrees and adjustable. The frets are not chord marks and it is about 8-9 percent remaining. Current String height is about 2.0 mm on the 12 F 6 string side, about 1.5 mm on the 1st string side.
